chunked_vad.lyrics_text: I don't like walking around this old and empty house So hold my hand, I'll walk with you my dear The stairs creak as you sleep It's keeping me awake
So hold my hand, I'll walk with you my dear The stairs creak as you sleep It's keeping me awake It's the house telling you to close your eyes
The stairs creak as you sleep It's keeping me awake It's the house telling you to close your eyes And some days I can't even dress myself
It's keeping me awake It's the house telling you to close your eyes And some days I can't even dress myself It's killing me to see you this way
It's the house telling you to close your eyes And some days I can't even dress myself It's killing me to see you this way 'Cause though the truth may vary
And some days I can't even dress myself It's killing me to see you this way 'Cause though the truth may vary This ship will carry our bodies safe to shore
It's killing me to see you this way 'Cause though the truth may vary This ship will carry our bodies safe to shore There's an old voice in my head
